string.name: note_offer_no
string.font: NOTE : YOU MAY BE CONTACTED DIRECTLY BY THE EMPLOYER AND PROVIDED WITH RELEVANT DOCUMENTS. PLEASE REMEMBER TO CHECK YOUR EMAIL AND RESPOND ACCORDINGLY. CHOOSE FROM ONE OF THE OPTIONS BELLOW TO NOTIFY THE EMPLOYER OF YOUR DECISION

string.name: note_offer_with
string.font: NOTE : REVIEW, SIGN AND UPLOAD THE OFFER DOCUMENT IN ORDER TO ACCEPT THIS JOB OFFER.

string.name: note_final_interview
string.font: NOTE : YOU MAY PROCEED BY CLICKING SUBMIT IF YOU ARE AVAILABLE FOR ALL OF THE OPTIONS PROVIDED.

font.font: FILE UPLOAD questions may require the use \nof a computer or laptop.

resources.string:
SO CLOSE YET SO FAR... ALMOST THERE.
HERE IS THE LAST ROUND.... FINAL INTERVIEW.
